hero.title: Building bridges in <highlight>digital commerce</highlight>
hero.subtitle: We are a passionate team focused on simplifying the lives of multichannel sellers.

story.title: Our story
paragraphs: Bridgely was born from a real frustration. As sellers across multiple marketplaces, we spent hours every week manually converting files, making mistakes, and losing valuable time that could be invested in growing our business.
In 2022, we decided to build the tool we always wished we had: a simple, fast, and reliable solution to convert product files between any ecommerce platform.
Today, Bridgely helps thousands of sellers across Latin America save time and avoid errors in their catalog migrations. And this is just the beginning.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: We believe powerful tools should be easy to use.

items.title: Commitment
items.description: We are dedicated to the success of every seller who trusts us.

items.description: We democratize access to enterprise-level tools.

hero.title: Everything you need to <highlight>migrate products</highlight> between marketplaces and ecommerce platforms
hero.subtitle: Powerful tools designed for sellers operating across multiple marketplaces.

items.title: Multi-format Conversion
items.description: Supports CSV, XLSX, XML, and JSON. Convert between any format required by your marketplaces.

items.title: Instant Processing
items.description: Convert thousands of products in seconds thanks to our optimized processing engine.

items.title: Smart Mapping
items.description: Our system automatically maps fields between platforms, identifying equivalent data.

items.title: Conversion History
items.description: Access all your previous conversions and reuse saved configurations.

items.title: Data Validation
items.description: Detect errors and issues in your files before importing them into the destination platform.

items.title: Multi-region
items.description: Supports country- and region-specific formats for Amazon, Mercado Libre, and more.

ctas.title: Ready to simplify your product migrations?
ctas.description: Join thousands of sellers who already save hours every week.

hero.title: Connect your <highlight>marketplaces</highlight> effortlessly
hero.subtitle: Convert import files between ecommerce platforms in seconds. From Mercado Libre to Amazon, Shopify, and more.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to migrate your products between platforms

steps.title: Upload your file
steps.description: Drag and drop your export file from any marketplace. We support CSV, XLSX, and more.

steps.title: Validate the source
steps.description: Validate the source format or select the correct one.

steps.title: Select destination
steps.description: Choose the destination platform and customize field mapping to fit your needs.

steps.title: Download the converted file
steps.description: Get your file ready to import into the new platform. No errors, no hassle.

input.title: Drag files here
input.subtitle: or click to select them
input.filesSubtitle: You can drag more files if you want

platforms.title: All your platforms, <highlight>connected</highlight>
platforms.description: We support the leading ecommerce platforms across Latin America and worldwide

hero.title: Simple plans, <highlight>transparent pricing</highlight>
hero.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your business. No hidden fees.

questions.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise plans.

questions.question: Is there any long-term contract?
questions.answer: No, all our plans are monthly with no commitment. You can cancel at any time.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer 2 months free when you choose annual billing on Pro and Enterprise plans.

informationCollected.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollected.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, payment information, and the files you upload for conversion.
items: Payment information (securely processed by third parties)

informationUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
informationUsage.description: We use the collected information to:

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data. Uploaded files are automatically deleted 24 hours after processing. We use SSL/TLS encryption for all communications.

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We only share data with third-party service providers required to operate our platform (such as payment processors and hosting providers), under strict confidentiality agreements.

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Export your data in a portable format
Withdraw your consent at any time

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using Bridgely, you agree to be legally bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you must not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Bridgely provides tools to convert product files between different formats used by marketplaces and ecommerce platforms. The service includes format conversion, field mapping, and data validation.

account.title: 3. Registration and Account
account.description: To use certain services, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your password
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: You agree not to use the service to:

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Bridgely and all its content, features, and functionality are owned by Bridgely and are protected by intellectual property laws. You do not acquire any ownership rights over the service beyond the limited right of use granted under these terms.

payments.title: 6. Payments and Subscriptions
payments.description: Paid plans are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis. We reserve the right to modify pricing with 30 days prior notice.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Bridgely is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion. You may cancel your account at any time from your profile settings.

modifications.title: 9. Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a notice on the platform.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.description: For questions regarding these terms, contact us at:
